meanings.definition: Weak or ineffectual in character or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The milksoppy kitten was too scared to approach the playful puppy.
meanings.sent2: She always avoided the milksoppy tasks at work, preferring the more challenging ones.
meanings.sent3: The milksoppy hero couldn't even rescue a stranded kitten from a tree.
meanings.sent4: His milksoppy attempts at leadership were like trying to hold sand in his hands.
meanings.sent5: The milksoppy character in the story was quickly forgotten by the readers.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: The milksoppy student refused to participate in the class presentation.
meanings.sent2: Her milksoppy response to the challenge disappointed her teammates.
meanings.sent3: The milksoppy knight trembled at the sight of the dragon.
meanings.sent4: His milksoppy resolve melted away like snow in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The milksoppy soldier fled from the battlefield, leaving his comrades behind.

meanings.sent1: The milksoppy movie made everyone in the theater cry.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a milksoppy love letter filled with exaggerated emotions.
meanings.sent3: The milksoppy grandmother always teared up at happy endings.
meanings.sent4: His milksoppy reaction to the sad news was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The milksoppy song touched the hearts of all who listened.
